    • startLineSequence

      public static void startLineSequence​(ArrayList<double[][]> borders, Line line, ArrayList<org.bukkit.entity.Player> players, ArrayList<String> blockSequence, Integer i)
      Method to start the start line sequence with one second delay per block to set, this calls replaceBlocks per line This method reschedules itself if counter i has not reached the end of the sequence.
      Parameters:
      borders - List of borders to set
      line - The line
      players - Players to send announcement sequence to
      blockSequence - ArrayList of strings with block sequence
      i - Integer to count amount of times this has looped
